CustomBehavior.Text: You must be Horde to run this profile!
Choose Either Den or Tavern.\n\nTavern has a 20% XP Boost!

PickUp.QuestName: The Right Parts for the Job

TurnIn.QuestName: The Right Parts for the Job

CustomBehavior.Lua: if MovieFrame and MovieFrame:IsVisible() then MovieFrame:StopMovie() elseif CinematicFrame and CinematicFrame:IsVisible() then CinematicFrame_CancelCinematic() end
